name: ORS Prisoners without recent Offender Supervisor and OMU Case Notes
description:
This report retrieves a list of Prisoners who have not had a meaningful OS and OMU Case Note entered on Prison NOMIS within the last 30 days. The report is over 4 tabs By Wing, By Prisoner, By Offender Supervisor and By Last Contact Date. The report prompts for Establishment Code and Wing (All for all).
DQ0025 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 03/07/18

dataset.name: Case Notes
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 1) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 1) + 1, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) = 0 THEN LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION) ELSE INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) - INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 1) END - 1) END AS UNIT_CODE_1, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE, AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.NOTE_SOURCE_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES, OMS_OWNER.LIVING_UNITS AT_LIVING_UNITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID = AT_LIVING_UNITS.LIVING_UNIT_ID) AND (NOT AT_LIVING_UNITS.HOUSING_UNIT_TYPE IN ('OU', 'REC')) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_LIVING_UNITS.AGY_LOC_ID || '-' || AT_LIVING_UNITS.LEVEL_1_CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE IN ('OSE', 'OMU'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, UNIT_CODE_1, AGY_LOC_ID, CONTACT_DATE, DESCRIPTION, NOTE_SOURCE_CODE, CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, MAX(CONTACT_DATE) AS V_MAX_CONTACT_DATE, (TO_DATE(V_MAX_CONTACT_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TRUNC(SYSDATE), 'DD/MM/YYYY')) AS V_CONTACT_DATE, CASE WHEN V_OS_NULL = 1 THEN 'OS NOT ALLOCATED' ELSE CASE WHEN V_OS_1 = '1' THEN 'MULTIPLE OS - PLEASE CHECK RECORD' ELSE V_OFFENDER_SUPERVISOR END END AS V_OS_DISPLAY FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Offender Supervisor
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_PEOPLE.FIRST_NAME, AT_PEOPLE.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.PERSONS AT_PEOPLE, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CONTACT_PERSONS AT_CONTACTS, OMS_OWNER.LIVING_UNITS AT_LIVING_UNITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID = AT_LIVING_UNITS.LIVING_UNIT_ID) AND (NOT AT_LIVING_UNITS.HOUSING_UNIT_TYPE IN ('OU', 'REC')) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_CONTACTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_PEOPLE.PERSON_ID (+) = AT_CONTACTS.PERSON_ID) AND (AT_CONTACTS.RELATIONSHIP_TYPE = 'OFS' AND AT_CONTACTS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_LIVING_UNITS.AGY_LOC_ID || '-' || AT_LIVING_UNITS.LEVEL_1_CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, CONTACT_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_CASE_NOTE_MONTH <> 2)

field.name: $ref:V_OS_DISPLAY
field.legacySql: =If([v_OS_null] = 1; "OS NOT ALLOCATED"; If([v_OS_>1] = "1";"MULTIPLE OS - PLEASE CHECK RECORD";[v_Offender_Supervisor]))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_CASE_NOTE_MONTH <> 2)

field.name: $ref:V_OS_DISPLAY
field.legacySql: =If([v_OS_null] = 1; "OS NOT ALLOCATED"; If([v_OS_>1] = "1";"MULTIPLE OS - PLEASE CHECK RECORD";[v_Offender_Supervisor]))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_CASE_NOTE_MONTH <> 2)

field.name: $ref:V_OS_DISPLAY
field.legacySql: =If([v_OS_null] = 1; "OS NOT ALLOCATED"; If([v_OS_>1] = "1";"MULTIPLE OS - PLEASE CHECK RECORD";[v_Offender_Supervisor]))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_CASE_NOTE_MONTH <> 2)

field.name: $ref:V_OS_DISPLAY
field.legacySql: =If([v_OS_null] = 1; "OS NOT ALLOCATED"; If([v_OS_>1] = "1";"MULTIPLE OS - PLEASE CHECK RECORD";[v_Offender_Supervisor]))
